title: Have a New Kid by Friday: How to Change Your Child's Attitude, Behavior & Character in 5 Days
description: Every kid in America will hate this book! But moms will love it!  Tired of defiant attitudes and power struggles with your little ankle-biters? Then you need this book. With his signature wit and wisdom, internationally recognized family expert Dr. Kevin Leman reveals why your kids do what they do and what you can do about it. He gives you simple principles that can give you results in as little as 5 days.
author: Kevin Leman
